entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches developing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
